scripts.package:styles:
echo 'Bundling styles into Javascript 
' && npx webpack --mode=production --config webpack.styles.config.js
scripts.package:main:
echo 'Bundling main.js and runtime.js 
' && cat dist/library/runtime.js dist/library/main.js dist/library/cybrid-sdk-ui.styles.js > dist/library/cybrid-sdk-ui.min.js
scripts.package:extras:
echo 'Copying README.md and package.json 
' && cp library/README.md dist/library && cp library/package.json dist/library
scripts.package:library:
echo 'Building and packaging library 
' && ng build library && npm run package:styles && npm run package:polyfills && npm run package:main && npm run package:extras && npx webpack --mode=production --config webpack.main.config.js
scripts.test: echo 'clearing angular cache...' && rm -rf .angular && ng run library:test
scripts.format: echo ' Formatting Demo ' && echo && echo && npx prettier 'src/**/*.{js,jsx,ts,tsx,html,css,scss}' --write && npx prettier 'cypress/**/*.{js,jsx,ts,tsx,html,css,scss}' --write && echo && echo ' Formatting Components ' && echo && echo && npx prettier 'library/**/**/*.{js,jsx,ts,tsx,html,css,scss}' --write
